# Interface IntentMatcherConfigInterface

Interface for configuring intent matcher behavior.

interface IntentMatcherConfigInterface {  
embeddingMatcherConfig?: [EmbeddingMatcherConfigInterface](./primitives_intent_embedding_matcher_config.EmbeddingMatcherConfigInterface);  
llmMatcherConfig?: [LLMMatcherConfigInterface](./primitives_intent_llm_matcher_config.LLMMatcherConfigInterface);  
topNIntents?: number;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

embeddingMatcherConfig? llmMatcherConfig? topNIntents?

## Properties

### `Optional`embeddingMatcherConfig

embeddingMatcherConfig?: [EmbeddingMatcherConfigInterface](./primitives_intent_embedding_matcher_config.EmbeddingMatcherConfigInterface)

Configuration for embedding-based intent matching

### `Optional`llmMatcherConfig

llmMatcherConfig?: [LLMMatcherConfigInterface](./primitives_intent_llm_matcher_config.LLMMatcherConfigInterface)

Configuration for LLM-based intent matching

### `Optional`topNIntents

topNIntents?: number

Maximum number of top intents to return in matches
